agnEq viSvE#BiH svanIka dEqvairUrNA#vantaM prathaqmaH sI#daq yOni$M | 
kuqlAqyina#M GRuqtava#nta(gm) saviqtrE yaqj~jaM na#yaq yaja#mAnAya sAqdhu || 
sIda# hOtaqH sva u# lOqkE ci#kiqtvAnthsAqdayA# yaqj~ja(gm) su#kRuqtasyaq yOnau$ | 
dEqvAqvIrdEqvAn. haqviShA# yajAqsyagnE# bRuqhad-yaja#mAnEq vayO# dhAH || 
ni hOtA# hOtRuqShada#nEq vidA#nastvEqShO dI#diqvA(gm) a#sadath suqdakSha#H | 
ada#bdhavrata-pramatiqrvasi#ShThaH sahasraM BaqraH Suci#jihvO aqgniH || tvaM dUqtastva - [  ]   33
